org.assertj.swing.fixture

Interface TextInputFixture<S>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - used to simulate "self types." For more information please read "Emulating 'self types' using Java Generics to simplify fluent API implementation."
    All Superinterfaces:
    EditableComponentFixture<S>, TextDisplayFixture<S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JTextComponentFixture

    public interface TextInputFixture<S>
extends TextDisplayFixture<S>, EditableComponentFixture<S>
    Simulates user events on Components that accept text input from the user.
    Author:
    Alex Ruiz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      S deleteText()
      Simulates a user deleting all the text in the Component managed by this fixture.
      S enterText(java.lang.String text)
      Simulates a user entering the given text in the Component managed by this fixture.
      S select(java.lang.String text)
      Simulates a user selecting the given text contained in the Component managed by this fixture.
      S selectAll()
      Simulates a user selecting all the text contained in the Component managed by this fixture.
      S selectText(int start, int end)
      Simulates a user selecting a portion of the text contained in the Component managed by this fixture.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.assertj.swing.fixture.TextDisplayFixture

        requireText, requireText, text

      • Methods inherited from interface org.assertj.swing.fixture.EditableComponentFixture

        requireEditable, requireNotEditable

    • Method Detail

      • enterText

        @Nonnull
S enterText(@Nonnull
                  java.lang.String text)
        Simulates a user entering the given text in the Component managed by this fixture.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to enter.
        Returns:
        this fixture.

S deleteText()
        Simulates a user deleting all the text in the Component managed by this fixture.
        Returns:
        this fixture.

S selectAll()
        Simulates a user selecting all the text contained in the Component managed by this fixture.
        Returns:
        this fixture.

      • selectText

        @Nonnull
S selectText(int start,
                   int end)
        Simulates a user selecting a portion of the text contained in the Component managed by this fixture.
        Parameters:
        start - index where selection should start.
        end - index where selection should end.
        Returns:
        this fixture.
